Name: This Game is Crap
About the game: This game has only one goal to make you cry. If you think something doesn't work as it should, then you're thinking right. Beware of the following notes Spoiler game content: This Game is Crap is a 2D jump and run comedy game that contains a lot of drops to deceive the player. It currently contains ten levels (more are planned) and impresses less with gamplay than with funny ideas. It is ideal to fool friends and good for playing in between. - Jump & Run - 19 Levels - Audio (no settings) - Grafik (no settings) - external Internet links to https:// pages - Languages: German, English (adjustable in the game)
